name: careermantra
tag_list: elearning, corporate-trainings, bpo-training, lms, ims, scorm, scorm-1-2, scorm-2004
overview: CareerMantra(http://www.careermantra.com) provides complete Corporate Training & eLearning solutions for multiple domains and technologies.They are leader in Managerial training ,Leadership training , Soft Skills training , BPO training , IT training ,Technology training ,American Accent and Culture training .Their eLearning solutions are among the best in the industry.They offer complete LMS solutions ,Online courses, Custom course ware and online assessment solution with large pool of questions. Specialist in SCORM 1.2 , SCORM 2004 conformance course creation.
